nodes.text: Harus Ison was a male individual who served the Imperial Security Bureau during the early days of the Galactic Empire. In 14 BBY, he held the position of ISB Deputy Director. In this position, and as a member of COMPNOR, it was his responsibility to report directly to his Bureau Chief, as well as the head of COMPNOR, Director Armand Isard. Following the conclusion of the Berch Teller campaign, he was given a promotion and moved into the Ubiqtorate.
